text:
@realDonaldTrump Actions taken:
1. Fired National Pandemic team 2018.
2. Called virus a hoax, soon gone, contained, soon zero cases while playing golf.
3. Responsible for the worst testing in the developed world.
4. Tried to throw 32 M people off healthcare by canceling ACA.
